dmca.title: Notice of Copyright infringement
dmca.body:
applinet

Google, Inc.
Attn: Blogger Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043
USA

Amsterdam; March 9, 2007

Re: notice of copyright infringement

Dear sir/madam,

I represent the internet publishing company Applinet B.V. located in Amsterdam, the Netherlands (chamber of commerce registration 33304053).

Someone has copied large amounts of copyrighted text without our permission from our website www.leren.nl to blog posts on http://officeorganiser.blogspot.com. Please immediately remove or disable all access to the infringing material.

The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears in four online courses on our website:
1. http://www.leren.nl/cursus/persoonlijke-effectiviteit/ret/
2. http://www.leren.nl/cursus/management/plannen/organiseren/
3. http://www.leren.nl/cursus/persoonlijke-effectiviteit/licht-denken/
4. http://www.leren.nl/cursus/persoonlijke-effectiviteit/energe/

The blog where my copyrighted work is published on is:

1. http://officeorganiser.blogspot.com/2007/02/rationele-effectiviteits-training.html
2. http://officeorganiser.blogspot.com/2007/02/plannen-en-organiseren.html
3. http://officeorganiser.blogspot.com/2007/02/licht-denken.html
4. http://officeorganiser.blogspot.com/2007/02/energie-voor-werk-of-studie.html

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted material described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

You can contact me by e-mail: R.Pijlman@applinet.nl.

Yours Sincerely,

Rene W.J. Pijlman,
CEO of Applinet B.V.
